meanings.definition: The quality or state of being talkative or chatty.
meanings.sent1: Her gabbinesses made her the life of the party.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy her gabbinesses during our coffee chats.
meanings.sent3: His gabbinesses at the meeting kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: The gabbinesses of the birds in the morning filled the air with joy.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's gabbinesses in class helped students stay engaged.

meanings.sent1: The gabbinesses of the radio host annoyed some listeners.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand his gabbinesses during the movie.
meanings.sent3: The cat's gabbinesses about its day made the owner chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The gabbinesses of the old clock echoed through the silent room.
meanings.sent5: The gabbinesses of the waterfall could be heard from afar.
